attributes.action: NHS Reform - Amendment SI257 to be discussed in parliament
attributes.additional_details:
The SI257 amendment to the reform bill for the NHS is being put through parliament without debate and there is little to no coverage in the media for the same.

Given the scope of the change and its future impact, the public must be made aware and given the opportunity to petition the house as with any other bill.

This petition demands that the amendment be delayed and that full house debate both in the commons and in the House of Lords be scheduled.
